sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Bucks Run ski trail will be groomed today, March 7, 2025.  The north loop of the trail is completely unusable at this time.  The current trail is approximately .5 km.  There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run. Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.
Please adhere to posted hours. Buck’s Run last day is Sunday, March 9, 2025.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Repeating the great conditions of yesterday , a light overnight snow groomed over the hard flat deck made for perfect skating on Nubs upper blue and red loops .

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Skated Buck’s late this afternoon. Connector still intact but classic trails are in woods only. Soft and slow but not yet slushy. Forest dust throughout and a few spots with dirty snow. B skis are recommended if possible. This is the last weekend so enjoy it while you can!

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 6 lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be groomed and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Daily through this Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: It's a beautiful day at Nub's Nob. The sun is out this morning and thanks to some fresh snow overnight the conditions are very good. The corduroy feels like it is back to mid-winter type of snow. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with a deli and espresso bar. The M/D/V Speed Series concludes tonight with a GS on Scarface. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
